message.content:
cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.DB

The paper presents a scalable architecture for recommending 'next-best-offers' in an online setting using an ensemble of deep learning and machine learning algorithms. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of Machine Learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper involves real-time streaming technology and optimization of machine learning implementations, which could also place it in the sub-categories of Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). The use of deep learning networks and optimization techniques could also suggest the sub-categories of Data Structures and Algorithms (cs.DS) and Databases (cs.DB).
